sentences.en: A comprehensive description is one that is full and complete.
sentences.cn: 一篇详尽的描写就是一篇充实完整的描写.

sentences.en: a comprehensive guide to British hotels and restaurants
sentences.cn: 一本介绍英国酒店和餐厅的详尽指南

sentences.en: a comprehensive listing of all airlines
All the products are labelled with comprehensive instructions.
sentences.cn: 所有产品均标有详尽的使用说明。

sentences.en: An objective test can be quite comprehensive.
He was educated at a co-ed comprehensive school.
sentences.cn: 他就读于一所男女生同校的综合性学校。

sentences.en: She taught French at Cheam Comprehensive in South London.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦南部的奇姆综合中学教法语。

sentences.en: Streaming within comprehensive schools is common practice.
sentences.cn: 综合中学常把学生按能力分班。

sentences.en: That must be the oval unroofed amphitheater in Rome. It was basically a stadium with comprehensive functions.
sentences.cn: 那就是罗马的椭圆型露天竞技场了, 基本上是综合功能的体育场.

sentences.en: The following guidelines do not aim to be totally comprehensive.
sentences.cn: 以下指导原则并非想要面面俱到。

sentences.en: The problems concerning mountains , rivers, farmland, forests and roads should be tackled in a comprehensive way.
sentences.cn: 实行山、水 、 田 、 林、路综合治理.

sentences.en: The Rough Guide to Nepal is a comprehensive guide to the region.
sentences.cn: 《尼泊尔概况》是一本全面介绍该地区的旅游指南。

sentences.en: There are much brighter prospects for a comprehensive settlement than before.
sentences.cn: 综合性的社区具有比以前更加光明的前景。

sentences.en: This full-colour supplement includes full race details, plus a comprehensive run-down on all the British hopefuls.
sentences.cn: 这份全彩附录包含了完整的比赛信息和对所有可能获胜的英国运动员的详细介绍。

sentences.en: Two very clear and comprehensive handbooks are available.
sentences.cn: 现有两种清晰易懂内容全面的手册供应.

sentences.en: We offer our customers a comprehensive range of financial products.
sentences.cn: 我们为客户提供全面的金融产品。

sentences.en: Within the compass of a normal sized book such a comprehensive survey was not practicable.
sentences.cn: 在通常一本书的篇幅中要作如此全面的调查不太实际。

words.tran_cn: 包含多的,广泛的,全面的

phrases.tran_cn: 综合治理；综合治疗；综合处理

trans.tran_en: motor insurance that pays for damage whether it is caused by you or someone else
